# Getting Started with Object UI

Object UI is a **universal, schema-driven UI engine** built on React + Tailwind + Shadcn.

## Installation

```bash
pnpm add @object-ui/components @object-ui/core @object-ui/react
```

## Quick Start

1. Install the packages
2. Import the components
3. Define your schema
4. Render with `<SchemaRenderer>`

### Example Schema

```json
{
  "type": "div",
  "className": "p-4",
  "children": [
    {
      "type": "text",
      "content": "Hello World"
    }
  ]
}
```

## Features

- ‚úÖ **Tailwind Native** - Full control over styling
- ‚úÖ **Type Safe** - TypeScript support out of the box
- ‚úÖ **Lazy Loading** - Automatic code splitting
- ‚úÖ **Plugin System** - Extend with custom components

> **Note:** All plugin components are lazy-loaded by default!

## Code Blocks with Syntax

```typescript
import { ComponentRegistry } from '@object-ui/core';
import '@object-ui/plugin-markdown';

const schema = {
  type: 'markdown',
  content: '# Hello World'
};
```

## Emphasis

*Italic text* and **bold text** and ***bold italic***

~~Strikethrough~~ is also supported!
